course_description: Algebraic curves, algebraic varieties, sheaves, cohomology, Riemann-Roch theorem. Classification of algebraic surfaces, moduli spaces, deformation theory and, obstruction theory, the notion of schemes.
prerequisites: MATH 523 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
schedule_location: MW 11:30am-12:45pm in Math & Science Center - N306
sections: Class Nbr: 4628, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: B. Ullery, Status: Open
